code: function generateEZTemplateAuton(points){let codeLines=[];codeLines.push("// EZ-Template Auton Path");points.forEach((point,i)=>{const x=point.x;const y=point.y;const heading=point.heading;if(i===0)codeLines.push("chassis.odom_xyt_set(".concat(x," , ").concat(y,", ").concat(heading,");"));else if(point.direction==="fwd"){codeLines.push("  // Move to point ".concat(i+1));codeLines.push("chassis.pid_odom_set({{ ".concat(x," , ").concat(y," }, fwd, ").concat(heading,"});"));}else{codeLines.push("  // Move to point ".concat(i+1));codeLines.push("chassis.pid_odom_set({{ ".concat(x," , ").concat(y," }, rev, ").concat(heading,"});"));}});codeLines.push("chassis.pid_wait(); }");return codeLines.join("\n");}export{generateEZTemplateAuton};
